issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Pinch and Zoom does not work on iPad.

This is not a regression.This even occurs on 2.1.3.GA

Steps to reproduce:

1. Install Kitchen Sink on device
2. Tap on base UI>Views>WebViews>Local Pinch/Zoom.
3. Pinch/Zoom out the image.

Actual Result:

Pinch and Zoom effect does not happens on image.It works fine on iPhone device.

Expected Result:

Pinch and Zoom effect should happen on image.
fields.summary: iOS :Kitchen Sink: Webviews - Pinch and Zoom does not work on iPad
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium Studio: 3.0.0.201210031708
Tested with Titanium SDK: 3.0.0.v20121004213313
iOS Device: iPad 3(6.0),iOS Simulator 6.0,iPad 2(5.1)
OS: Mac OSX 10.8.1
Xcode : 4.5

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
